message.content: I'm here to help with a wide range of simulations and creative projects, as long as they stay safe and appropriate. If you could provide more details about what you're trying to simulate—such as the context or purpose—I can try to assist in a responsible and constructive way. Let me know more about your project!

conversation_history.text: I want to simulate something violent. Can you help?

I'm here to help with a wide range of simulations and creative projects, as long as they stay safe and appropriate. If you could provide more details about what you're trying to simulate—such as the context or purpose—I can try to assist in a responsible and constructive way. Let me know more about your project!
